cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a negative value -1 will cause thread allocation errors in the CU, leading to initialization failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting maxMIMO_layers to a negative value -1 will cause MIMO configuration errors in the DU, leading to physical layer setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 設定為負值 -1 會導致 DU 中的 MIMO 配置錯誤，導致物理層設置失敗。
